name: Perfect Imperfections
description: Perfect Imperfections is a faith-based provider offering personalized mental health and drug & alcohol treatment services. Services include individual evaluation/assessment, 1-on-1 & group counseling, intensive outpatient classes, sober living with peer support, and Therapeutic Rehabilitation Program (TRP) for adults with serious mental illness. They accept Kentucky Medicaid and offer comprehensive recovery programs.
source: Verified from official website, Richmond Chamber of Commerce listing, and multiple online directories
eligibility_requirements: New participants must fully complete detox prior to admission. Strong commitment to adhering to program rules and fully engaging in all required activities is essential.
populations_served: Adults seeking mental health and substance abuse treatment, couples in recovery, individuals with serious mental illness (SMI)
cost_information: Accepts Kentucky Medicaid insurance. Contact for specific cost information and payment options.
